metadata.name: !!~External item descriptions
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/l9nbaxP.png[/img] This mod displays detailed information about all items, trinkets, cards, runes and pills DIRECTLY onto your screen. Say goodbye to your browser tab with platinumgod open ;)
[img]https://i.imgur.com/bRGqujD.png[/img] [url=https://discord.gg/HhD4vMM4bZ]Need help or want to chat? Join our Discord server![/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/P6a8043.png[/img] [url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions]Check this project out on GitHub![/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/QmqdAmr.png[/img] [list] [*] [b]Compatible with Afterbirth+ and Repentance[/b] [*] Displays information for all collectibles, trinkets, cards, runes, pills, horsepills and some rooms [*] Displays [b]additional information[/b] like item type, charges, transformations, Spindown Dice results, Bag of Crafting recipes, TMTRAINER item effects (Detailed informations require --luadebug flag!), and much much more! [*] Displays one of 4 different indicators around the inspected item [*] Mod support for nearly all mods! [*] Easy to use API ([url=https://github.com/wofsauge/External-Item-Descriptions/wiki]Documentation here[/url]) [*] A huge amount of custom options like: [list] [*] Indicators [*] Font styles [*] Languages [*] And a lot of visual options! [/list] [/list]
[b]Press F2 to hide/show the descriptions![/b]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/PFTZnfC.png[/img] Simply install [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2681875787]'Mod Config Menu Pure'[/url]. You can use it to configure the mod while playing.
Or:
[h1]Windows[/h1] 1. With Repentance: ..\steamapps\common\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\mods\external item descriptions_836319872\ 1. With AB+: ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\ 2. Open "eid_config.lua" with any texteditor 3. Edit the config 4. Save the file 5. Play the game
To reset the config to default, delete all the "save[NUMBER].dat" files from the following folder: 1. With Repentance: ..\steamapps\common\The Binding of Isaac Rebirth\data\external item descriptions\ 1. With AB+: ..\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Afterbirth+ Mods\External item descriptions\
[h1]Linux[/h1] Same as Windows, but the path is: /home/%Username%/.steam/steam/steamapps/workshop/content/250900/836319872
